title: [Neuroscience] Researchers identify new ways to characterize states of consciousness using functional MRI, an imaging technique that allows you to see and measure brain activity through changes in blood flow over time, providing new insight into how they describe and study conscious states

[Epidemiology] A study on 4928 students found that 17.1% had at least one cardiac symptom after the second dose of the BNT162b2 (Pfizer) vaccine. 1.03% had significant electrocardiogram (ECG) changes after vaccination, however, all symptoms improved during a 1 month follow-up.
